name: AIOStreams
description: AIOStreams is a super-addon for Stremio that consolidates multiple addons and debrid services into a single, highly customisable interface. It aggregates streams from all your favorite sources, filters, sorts, and formats them according to your rules. Includes 10+ built-in addons for torrents and usenet, advanced filtering engine, unified catalog management, and custom stream formatting.
author: Viren070

form_fields.label: Secret Key
form_fields.hint: 64-character hex string for encryption. Generate with: [System.Guid]::NewGuid().ToString('N') + [System.Guid]::NewGuid().ToString('N')

form_fields.label: Addon Password
form_fields.hint: Password to protect addon installation. Leave empty to disable.

form_fields.label: TMDB Access Token
form_fields.hint: TMDB access token for title matching filter (optional but recommended).

form_fields.label: Trusted UUIDs
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated list of UUIDs allowed to use regex filters. Get your UUID from the AIOStreams config page.
